text: The Duel may refer to: ==Literature== *The Duel (poem), a poem by Eugene Field *"The Duel" (Chekhov story), an 1891 short story by Anton Chekhov *The Duel (Kuprin novel), a 1905 novel by Aleksandr Kuprin *"The Duel" (Conrad story), 1908 short story by Joseph Conrad *"The Duel" (Borges story), a 1970 short story by Jorge Luis Borges *The Duel: Pakistan on the Flight Path of American Power, a 2008 book by Tariq Ali ==Film and television== *The Duel (1910 film) *The Duel (1927 film) *The Duel (1939 film) *The Duel (1971 film), a 1971 Hong Kong film *The Duel (2000 film), a 2000 Chinese Lunar New Year's wuxia film directed by Andrew Lau *The Duel (2010 film), a 2010 film *The Duel (2016 film) *"The Duel" (How I Met Your Mother), a 2005 episode of How I Met Your Mother *"The Duel" (The Office), a 2009 episode of The Office *Real World/Road Rules Challenge: The Duel, the 2006–2007 season of the MTV reality television program Real World/Road Rules Challenge *"The Duel", a composition by Giorgio Moroder for the film Electric Dreams ==Other== *The Duel: Test Drive II, a cross-platform racing game *The Duel (Dexter Gordon album) *The Duel (Allison Moorer album) ==See also== *Duel (disambiguation)
title: The Duel
